00023 
00024 #include <vle/extension/DifferenceEquation.hpp>
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 namespace Crop {
00029 
00030     class CropPhenology: public vle::extension::DifferenceEquation::Multiple
00031     {
00032     public:
00033         CropPhenology(const vle::devs::DynamicsInit& init,
00034               const vle::devs::InitEventList& events) :
00035         vle::extension::DifferenceEquation::Multiple(init, events)
00036         {
00037         // Variables d'etat gerees par ce composant CropPhenology
00038         ThermalTime = createVar("ThermalTime");
00039         TempEff = createVar("TempEff");
00040         TempMean = createVar("TempMean");
00041 
00042         // Variables  gérées par un autre  composant ici "meteo"
00043         TempMin = createSync("TempMin"); 
00044         TempMax = createSync("TempMax");
00045 
00046         // Lecture des parametres
00047         P_TempBase = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("P_TempBase"));
00048         }
00049 
00050 
00051         virtual ~CropPhenology() {};
00052 
00053 
00054             virtual void compute(const vle::devs::Time& /*time*/)
00055         {
00056         //std::cout << "CropPhenology compute begin" << std::endl;
00057         TempMean = (TempMax() + TempMin()) / 2;
00058         
00059         double TempEff_tmp = TempMean() - P_TempBase;
00060         if (TempMean() < P_TempBase) {
00061             TempEff_tmp = 0.0;
00062         }
00063         
00064         TempEff = TempEff_tmp;
00065             
00066         ThermalTime = ThermalTime(-1) + TempEff();
00067 
00068         }
00069 
00070             virtual void initValue(const vle::devs::Time& /* time */)
00071             {
00072         //std::cout << "CropPhenology init begin" << std::endl;
00073         ThermalTime = 0.0;
00074         TempMean = 0.0;
00075         TempEff = 0.0;
00076         }
00077 
00078 
00079         private:
00080         //Variables d'etat
00081         Var ThermalTime; 
00082         Var TempMean; 
00083         Var TempEff; 
00085         //Entrées
00086         Sync TempMin;
00087         Sync TempMax;
00088 
00089         //Parametres du modele
00090         double P_TempBase; 
00092     };
00093 }
00094 DECLARE_NAMED_DYNAMICS(CropPhenology, Crop::CropPhenology); // balise specifique VLE
